alert.note: Alert for Upper Columbia Basin (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 09 at 1:27AM PDT until August 09 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...High temperatures in the mid 90s to near 100 degrees. * WHERE...Grand Coulee, Coulee City, Odessa, Creston, Ralston, Electric City, Lamona, Stratford, Harrington, Coulee Dam, Ritzville, and Wilbur. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures will significantly increase the potential or heat related illnesses, particularly for those sensitive to heat. Residents without air conditioners will experience a build up of heat within their homes during the afternoon and evening hours.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
